name: Wombaxe - Heroes of the Burrow
description:
This was an entry to Melbourne Global Game Jam 2023. Theme: Roots

Darkness has fallen upon Wombville. Evil energies have turned nature against you, and only your determination and your axes can save your hometown.

GOAL

Defend your home by chopping down nasty evil roots - retreat home for heal if necessary! And don't forget to grow when the time comes.

CONTROLS

LEFT CLICK/DRAG - select Wombaxes

RIGHT CLICK - move Wombaxes

ASWD and SCROLL - control camera

CREDITS

Scott Campbell, Sergey Germogentov, Gonzalo Perez de la Ossa - Programming

Adam Robertson, Scott Campbell - Art, 3D Modelling

abbysinthe, Natasha Pearson - Music, SFX
